english: Time is made up of a split second product, good at using sporadic time person, will make greater achievement.
chinese: 时间是由分秒积成的，善于利用零星时间的人，才会做出更大的成绩来。
author: Hua Luogeng（华罗庚）

english: If people are devotedly to do something, always can meet by chance.
chinese: 人们若是一心一意地做某一件事，总是会碰到偶然的机会的。
author: Honoré de Balzac（巴尔扎克）

english: Life's a little bit messy. We all make mistakes. No matter what type of animal you are, change starts with you.
chinese: 生活总会有那么点不顺心，我们都会犯错。天性如何并不重要，改变都由你开始。
author: Zootopia（动物方城市）

english: Blessed is he who expects nothing, for he shall never be disappointed.
chinese: 一无所求的人是幸福的，因为他永远也不会失望。
author: Alexander Pope（亚历山大·蒲柏）

english: A man's best friends are his ten fingers.
chinese: 人最好的朋友是自己的10只手指。
author: Unknown

english: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
chinese: 人生就像骑自行车,要保持平衡就要不断前进。
author: Albert Einstein
